title: 一个有趣的小玩意
txt_content: /give @p minecraft:firework_rocket{display:{Name:"[{"text":"小烟花（Made in China）","color":"dark_red","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false,"strikethrough":false,"obfuscated":false}]"},Fireworks:{Flight:5,Explosions:[{Flicker:1b,Type:0,Colors:[I;16711680],FadeColors:[I;3800832]},{Trail:1b,Flicker:1b,Type:1,Colors:[I;3012352],FadeColors:[I;517311]},{Type:2,Colors:[I;65504],FadeColors:[I;15871]},{Flicker:1b,Type:4,Colors:[I;16711925],FadeColors:[I;16711734]}]}} 1复制代码这是一个有很多特效的烟花（电脑渣慎用（1.14.4））
